info.name: Google Flat Dark by Wolfiy
info.description: A flat and dark version of Google :) Tested on Google.ch and Google.com but it should works on every Google :3
info.additionalInfo:
18th of April:
-Release

19th of April
-Updated (Should support more Googles)

20th of April
-Fix for Chrome

21th of April
-Fix for Google Image

22th of April
-Fix for the account buttons
-Fix for the apps top arrow
-Fix for the Search Tool bar
-Fix for separators
-Fix for font colors on the news
-Fix for the info text on the Wikipedia box

-Deleted the underlining of the links

26th of April
-Search button is now in grey!
-Changed the font
-Fixed the color of the predictions

11th of November
-Fixed the music titles search, it's now black :)

18th of August, 2017
-Various bugs have been fixed

19th of August, 2017
-Fixed names color (e.g. When searching "Who is the US president?")

4th of September, 2017
-Fixed side card for songs (e.g. when you search for an artist)
